info.title: Expressjs Lambda Boilerplate API
info.description: A boilerplate for ExpressJS applications that can be deployed to AWS Lambda

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: For accessing the API a valid JWT token must be passed in all the queries in the 'Authorization' header. A valid JWT token is generated by the API and retured in the response of a successful SignIn or SignUp request. The following value must be entered in the 'Value' field: Bearer {JWT token}
